author: Mariana
title: Two lots for sale in San José de la Montaña, Barva-Heredia
text:

Price: $193,779 Province: Heredia
Cantón: Barva
Land: 7177m2
Located in front of the luxury condominium “Monte Lagos” and 800m west of Rest. La Campesina. Residential zoning Lot 1 – 7073m2 = $190,971 Negotiable Lot 2 – 7177m2= $ 193,779 Negotiable Bargain priced at $27 x m2 Perfect for building your own house in the mountains or cabins with plenty of green space. See this and other listings in the new Tico Times Real Estate section here.
COD: 1112
Email: realestate@ticotimes.net
Phone: +(506) 2258-1558
